message:
Upper Body Strength

Workout:
- BB Bench Press: 5x5
- Weighted Pull-up: 4x6
- Overhead Press: 4x6
- DB Row: 3x8/side
- Dips: 3x8

Notes: Rest 2-3min between main lifts. Aim for RPE 8.
qualityNotes: Perfect example of TRAINING format. Clean structure: focus line, one blank line, single Workout section. Abbreviations used (BB, DB). Sets/reps format (5x5, 3x8/side). Brief notes for rest/RPE.

message:
Leg Hypertrophy

Workout:
- BB Back Squat: 4x10-12
- Romanian Deadlift: 4x10-12
- Leg Press: 3x12-15
- Walking Lunge: 3x12/leg
- Leg Curl: 3x12-15
- Calf Raise: 4x15-20

Notes: Rest 60-90s. Control the eccentric (3s down).
qualityNotes: Shows rep ranges (10-12, 12-15) for hypertrophy training. All exercises in one Workout section. Notes include rest and tempo guidance. Concise but complete.

message:
Push Day

Workout:
- BB Bench Press: 4x8
- SS1 Incline DB Press: 3x10
- SS1 Cable Fly: 3x12
- SS2 Lateral Raise: 3x15
- SS2 Tricep Pushdown: 3x12

Notes: No rest within superset pairs. Rest 60s after each pair.
qualityNotes: Perfect superset formatting. SS1 exercises paired, SS2 exercises paired. Notes clarify how to execute supersets. Bench press not in a superset (allows heavier load).

message:
Full Body Circuit

Workout:
- C1 Goblet Squat: 3x10
- C1 Push-up: 3x12
- C1 DB Row: 3x10/side
- C1 Plank: 3x30s
- C2 Reverse Lunge: 3x10/leg
- C2 DB Shoulder Press: 3x10
- C2 Bicycle Crunch: 3x15/side

Notes: Rest 15s between exercises, 60s between rounds.
qualityNotes: Two circuits clearly labeled (C1, C2). Beginner-friendly exercises. Notes explain rest structure. Per-side notation (/side, /leg) for unilateral moves.

message:
Lower Body + Conditioning

Strength:
- BB Front Squat: 4x6
- BB Hip Thrust: 4x8

Conditioning:
- KB Swing: 5x15
- Assault Bike: 3x 60s on/90s off

Notes: Rest 2min between strength sets. Push hard on conditioning.
qualityNotes: Multiple sections used appropriately (Strength, Conditioning). Interval notation for bike (60s on/90s off). Notes differentiate rest between sections.

message:
Pull Day

Workout:
- BB Deadlift: 4x5
- Weighted Chin-up: 4x6
- SS1 Seated Cable Row: 3x10
- SS1 Reverse Fly: 3x15
- SS2 Hammer Curl: 3x12
- SS2 BB Curl: 3x10

Notes: Rest 2-3min after deadlifts and chin-ups. No rest within supersets.
qualityNotes: Heavy compounds (deadlift, chin-up) first, then accessories in supersets. Notes specify different rest for compounds vs supersets.

message:
Bodyweight Workout

Workout:
- Push-up: 4x15
- Bulgarian Split Squat: 4x10/leg
- Pike Push-up: 3x10
- SL Glute Bridge: 3x12/leg

Core:
- Plank: 3x45s
- Dead Bug: 3x10/side
- Mountain Climber: 3x20

Notes: Rest 45s. No equipment needed.
qualityNotes: Two sections (Workout, Core). Bodyweight exercises clearly described. Abbreviation SL for single-leg. Notes confirm no equipment required.

message:
HIIT Cardio

Warm-Up:
- Light cycling: 5min
- Build-up sprint: 3x10s

Intervals:
- All-out sprint: 8x 30s on/60s off

Cooldown:
- Easy cycling: 5min
- Foam roll quads: 2min

Notes: Max effort on each sprint. Full recovery between rounds.
qualityNotes: Three sections (Warm-Up, Intervals, Cooldown). Interval notation (30s on/60s off). Notes clarify intensity expectations.

message:
Speed Work

Warm-Up:
- Easy jog: 10min
- A-skip: 2x30m
- High knees: 2x30m

Intervals:
- 400m repeat: 6x @ 5K pace
- Recovery jog: 90s between reps

Cooldown:
- Easy jog: 10min
- Calf stretch: 30s/side

Notes: Hit consistent splits. Don't go out too fast on rep 1.
qualityNotes: Sport-specific (running). Distance notation (400m, 30m). Pace guidance (@ 5K pace). Recovery jog between reps. Strategic coaching note.

message:
Easy Cardio

Run:
- Easy jog: 35min @ conversational pace

Cooldown:
- Walk: 5min
- Quad stretch: 30s/side
- Hamstring stretch: 30s/side

Notes: Keep HR under 140bpm. If you can't hold a conversation, slow down.
qualityNotes: Simple structure for cardio-focused session. Intensity guidance (conversational pace, HR under 140bpm). Cooldown stretches included.

message:
Active Recovery

- Easy activity: ~30m (walk, bike, jog, row, swim, etc.)
- Stretching: 5–10m (let me know if you need stretches)
qualityNotes: Perfect ACTIVE_RECOVERY format: NO section headers. Exactly 2 bullets. Permissive language (~30m, 5-10m, etc.). Not prescriptive.

message:
Active Recovery

- Easy activity: 20-30min (walk, light bike, swim, etc.)
- Foam roll: 10min (quads, hamstrings, IT band, back)
qualityNotes: ACTIVE_RECOVERY format: no headers, 2 bullets, time-based, permissive suggestions. Foam rolling listed as optional activity.
Perfect REST format: no headers, 1 bullet, minimal and supportive, optional gentle movement only.

message:
Rest Day

- Optional light stretching or walk: 10-15m if you feel restless
qualityNotes: REST format: no headers, 1 bullet, gentle suggestion. "if you feel restless" is supportive and permissive.
